RegulatoryCodeViolation.name: RegulatoryCodeViolation
RegulatoryCodeViolation.description: Represents the transactional violation data that has been identified during an inspection.

ComplianceDueDate.description: Due date for regulatory code compliance.

DateCreated.description: Date when the violation was created.

DateResolved.description: Date when the violation was resolved.

DaysOpen.description: Number of days the violation was unresolved.

InspectionAssmntIndId.description: Id of the inspection assessment indicator associated with the regulatory code violation.

InspectionId.description: Id of the inspection associated in which the violation was recorded.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

RecurrenceCount.description: Number of times the violation has recurred.
